execution_quality: Agent passively received structured validation messages from teammates; no active analysis or processing occurred on the agent's part.
work_category: Received and processed validation reports from two teammate agents checking spec documentation accuracy against design documents.
summary: This was a coordination checkpoint in a multi-agent validation workflow where the main agent received partial validation reports from teammate validators. The agent took no active work but served as a message receiver in an orchestrated validation process. The incomplete validation reports and idle notifications suggest the validation process was ongoing rather than a discrete task completion.
follow_up_pattern: User waiting for teammate validators to complete their validation runs and report findings; continuation of multi-agent validation workflow.
